member.name: T:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.WebSmokeTestTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing smoke test requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.WebSmokeTestTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by WebSmokeTest.Plugin requests.

member.name: T:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.WebSmokeTestMiddleware
member.summary: WebSmokeTest middleware class, this module extends BaseMiddlware and is injected into the request pipeline.

member.name: M:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.WebSmokeTestMiddlewareExtender.UseWebSmokeTest(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary:
IApplicationBuilder extender method.
Allows easy use of registering UseWebSmokeTest.Plugin

member.name: T:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.WebSmokeTestSettings
member.summary: Settings which affect how WebSmokeTest data is served.

member.name: P:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.WebSmokeTestSettings.StaticFileExtensions
member.summary: Delimited list of file extensions to ignore

member.name: P:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.WebSmokeTestSettings.Enabled
member.summary: Determines whether smoke testing is available or not, should be set to false when used on a live site

member.name: P:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.WebSmokeTestSettings.SiteId
member.summary: The unique site id for the Smoke Test

member.name: P:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.WebSmokeTestSettings.EncryptionKey
member.summary: The key used to encrypt smoke test data prior to sending

member.name: T:WebSmokeTest.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the WebSmokeTest.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
